import React from 'react' import {Menu, Input, Button, Row, Col, Card, Avatar, Form} from 'antd' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import Link from 'next/link' const dummy = { nickname : '리빈노이드', Post:[], Followings:[], Followers:[], } const AppLayout = ({children}) => { return(
노드버드 프로필 짹짹
{dummy.Post.length}
,
팔로잉
{dummy.Followings.length}
,
팔로워
{dummy.Followers.length}
]} > {dummy.nickname[0]}} title = {dummy.nickname} />


{children} 세번째 ); }; AppLayout.propTypes = { children : PropTypes.elementType, }; export default AppLayout;
